name: Sylvio And The Mountains Giants
description:
Play as Sylvio and explore a new world to protect.
Through different passages your skill and thinking abilities will be put to the test.

Gameplay

This open world platformer offers a vast world to discover with many passages to unlock and monsters to avoid or face.

Synopsis

The lands of Yahouna had been spreading peacefully for several millennia.
Born from a single seed, the forest had grown out of a desert land and made a once hostile world, welcoming.
But these new riches attracted greedy explorers who had no interest in plundering them.

Fortunately, the spirit of the forest was once powerful and was able to fight off these invaders by summoning the Mountains Giants.
Unfortunately, the Mountains Giants disappeared little by little once their mission was completed.

Alas, a new evil has come to disturb the fragile balance of the land of Yahouna. Only a clever and pure being can save them all...
